doc:
George McFarland https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_McFarland 0 George "Spanky" McFarland (October 2, 1928 – June 30, 1993) was an American actor most famous for his appearances as a child in the Our Gang series of short-subject comedies of the 1930s and 1940s. The Our Gang shorts were later syndicated to television as The Little Rascals. George_"_Spanky_"_McFarland ( October_2_,_1928 – June_30_,_1993 ) was an_American_actor_most_famous for his_appearances as a_child in the_Our_Gang_series of short-subject_comedies of the_1930s_and_1940s . The_Our_Gang_shorts were_later_syndicated to television as The_Little_Rascals .
